author: veithen
msg: Merged r834175, r960995 and r965068 to the 1.5 branch. This updates the build to org.apache:apache:7 and fixes some issues in the POM files.
Reverted r958361 which is no longer necessary.

author: ngn
msg: Add a wait to test until clients have been detected as logged in before attempting to check site stats

author: veithen
msg: Upgrade to the latest version of org.apache:apache.

author: jbellis
msg: clean up license headers.  patch by Nate McCall for CASSANDRA-1294

author: veithen
msg: Merged r777897 (as well as parts of r936434) to the 1.5 branch in order to simplify the build of the distribution. This also allows us to get rid of the *.mar.version properties which prevent us from automating the release process.
